Weekly Saludarity Meetup

16 Nov 2025Foo

Name: #

Saludarity

Two equally important co-purposes. #

Purpose 1: #

Nonviolent, pro-democracy actions in the mold of indivisible.org
Yes:
picketing Tesla
No:
picketing a data center
Above example explained:
Elon Musk is directly involved collapsing of public institutions, a main goal of anti-democracy groups. The environmental harm and AI-controversy of a data center is only tangentially connected to the collapse of democracy.

Purpose 2: #

Have fun.

# More details: #

  • Non-violence.
  • How to do Purpose 1: Our actions are both to enact a hundred ways to say no act on the pillars-of-power theory AND to move groups to an adjacent group along the five stage activist-against-authoritarianism - MAGA line.
  • How to do Purpose 2: Self explanatory. See each other - have fun. Feel hopeful. Supportive group.

Carl says:
People need to want to join even if not a zealot now.

Problem: #

  • how to make the group not a bunch of linux admins white men
  • recruiting from the couch; "it's really easy to get bummed out about politics" , "theyre all the same",

Invite: #

Jake
Matt Beecher
Nathaniel
Helena/Eugene
Anybody with lawn sign
(spouses)
Mark Geistlinger
??

Meeting #

-since last time how is my action going
-bring in news, IFF a next step is proposed
-group brainstorm: next-step based on theory pillar vulnerabilities
Post-meeting
-stick around as long as we feel like
